description: Student without trace, take first activity in list with the lowest level
Student achieved one exercise perfectly, take next in line activity
Student achieved last exercise perfectly which is the last activity (considering all activities were achieved)
Student with last exercise not achieved (level 2), take first activity level 1
Student with last exercise not achieved (level 0) and other activities achieved, take last achieved activity
Student with last exercise not achieved (level 2), first activity level 1 already achieved, take other level 1 activity
